department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: DFO requires GoPro deep sea camera system.
description: **GoPro Deep Sea Camera System**: \\- Bidder is to provide a fully equipped GoPro camera system for underwater use (depth rating: 2000m or more) including a GoPro camera housing that accommodates external batteries; two deep sea lights with external batteries and a set of green parallel lasers that is set exactly 10cm apart and at least 4 hours of record time; a compatible mechanism to mount the system on steel and aluminum camera platforms. \\- Expected duration of the Standing Offer is for one year with 3 additional one-year option periods.\\- \\
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Tender Title: Deep Sea GoPro Video Camera System (2000m or more)**

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End User Entity:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

**Solicitation Number:** WS4598974585

**Publication Date:** 2024-05-28

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-08 at 14:00:00

**Status:** Exired

**Description:** The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking a deep sea camera system with a depth rating of 2000m or more. The system must be able to record for at least 4 hours under cold conditions, and must consist of:

* A GoPro camera housing that accommodates external batteries
* Two deep sea lights with external batteries
* A set of green parallel lasers set exactly 10cm apart
* A compatible mechanism to mount the system on steel and aluminum camera platforms

The standing offer is for a duration of one year with three additional one-year option periods.

**Notice:**

* Reference
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19841218?extsite=MTk4NDEyMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**

* Heather Walsh (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: heather.walsh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (Invalid)
